name: Rocket Jumping Platformer
description: Through out the year of 2019 I plan to release a game once per week. For week four I wanted to make something original.  This proof of concept was the result. I may very well continue development on this one. You can learn more about the development process and the challenge that I am doing this year over at my YouTube channel.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI9aqy-pdD8H0Cz1dUCe0Q
